title: Reference Object
description: The references used for the demo.

id.description: An id for this reference used for citing it within the demo.

title.description: The title of the material being referenced.

authors.description: The authors of the paper or book being referenced, as a single string. Names should be comma-separated, and the Oxford comma should be used when there are 3 or more names, and before 'et al.'.

year.description: The year in which the paper or book was published.

month.description: The month in which the paper or book was published.

journal.description: The journal that the paper was published in. (Not relevant for books.)

publisher.description: The publisher of the book. (Not relevant for papers.)

doi.description: The DOI of the paper. (Not the DOI URL - just the DOI.)

url.description: The URL of the paper or webpage.

pages.description: The specific pages of a journal or book being referenced, as a mixed list of individual pages and page ranges - i.e., 57, 61-63, 67, 102-104.

volume.description: The volume of the journal or the multi-volume book.
